title: Koalas might need fecal transplants to survive on our planet
description: A short description of the post.

title: Poo transplants to help save koalas
description: This article explains the theme of the research to help the koalas to eat a wider range of food. According to the researchers, a fecal transplant may influence what species of eucalyptus koalas can feed on.

title: Koalas could get FAECES transplants to help the marsupials eat a wider variety of food and survive habitat loss
description: This article explains how we could help the species to eat another plants, and survive.
